main.name: Gaurav Khairnar
main.description: I'm a tech enthusiast and a passionate sports programmer. I like to build applications that make people's lives easier.
main.bio: My passion for solving programming challenges on various Competitive Coding websites have made me a better problem solver with solid knowledge on Data Structures and Algorithms. I love to work on the MERN stack for building API's and applications.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me. (feature under development)

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
education.description: My coursework at university is mainly focussed on OOP's, Data Strucutres, Project Development and Database Management systems.
I took Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry as majors in HSC and graduated with distinction.
Completed my schooling from Symbiosis School, Nashik.

work.title: RESTful API with CRUD operations
work.description: Created a REST API for a Student Grievance App with CRUD operations. The frontend of this app was built in React Native and the API was built using Node, Express and Mongoose. MongoDB was used for database.

work.title: A useful script to navigate Github from terminal
work.description: A Python script which allows users to see a full list of repositories, folders and files of a profile directly from terminal. Beautiful Soup 4 is used to scrape this data at runtime directly from Github web-pages.

work.title: Built a Neural Network for a Line Following robot
work.description: Successfully built a Neural Network in C++ without using a single library. Back-propagation and feed-forward algorithms were implemented from scratch. This Neural Network was trained on a small dataset where input was the IR sensor values and then was copied to Arduino after training was done to make the robot follow a line drawn on ground.

work.title: A ML model built to predict the survival of passangers on titanic
work.description: A SVM based model for predicting the survival of a passenger in Titanic. The model is trained using  the Kaggle dataset on Titanic Disaster.
